page.description: Writes a string to a file.

argument.name: Filename
argument.description: The path and name of the file to create.

argument.name: string
argument.description: The character data to write into the file.

argument.name: Encoding
argument.description: Set to 'UTF8' for a UTF8 encoded file. This adds the standard UTF8 prefix characters. (V12 Build 2288 and above).

page.discussion: The FILE.FROM_STRING() method creates a file from character data. Note : The target directory must exist or the function will fail.
page.example: dim cc as C cc = file.to_string("C:\Frame.Txt") ? len(cc) = 1777.000000 file.from_string("c:\new_frame.txt", cc)
